S.FORM: D vis Bert ns nalecuhan i Valmiera, Latvia, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. D vis Bert ns i 2001 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 42, namapili' tu nu Indiana Pacers putiput. 11 bulad 12 demiad, 1992 a mihca, D vis Bert ns, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
